name: Ice Cream Truckers
description:
Made by me for the Noroff 48hr Game Jam :)

Stuff ive yoinked for my game: 

Sounds: 

https://freesound.org/people/jusebago/sounds/515040/

https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/7xrMaCrAO2/

Truck model by my friend Niklas :)

LORE:::

-You play as a dad, he buys ice cream for his son and has to rush home before it melts

-Duke trucks and tractors on the highway as you run on your feet through the traffic

-Pickup some ice cubes along the road to refresh your icecream and stop it from melting

Good Luck
